meanings.sent1: After the first distillation, the scientist is redistilling the liquid to make it purer.
meanings.sent2: The distiller is redistilling the whiskey to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the soup, so he is redistilling it to save the dish.
meanings.sent4: She is redistilling her ideas to come up with a clearer solution.
meanings.sent5: The process of redistilling the perfume extract intensifies its fragrance.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of distillation again.
meanings.sent1: The water is redistilling in the distillation apparatus for further purification.
meanings.sent2: The essential oils are redistilling to separate them from impurities.
meanings.sent3: The experiment failed, so they are redistilling the mixture to try again.
meanings.sent4: The process of redistilling the alcohol ensures its high quality.
meanings.sent5: Redistilling the liquid helps in concentrating its properties.
